resources.string: You quit before completing the payment
The CVV is a 3-digit security code at the back of your card
Please try again or select an alternative payment option.

•	 Enter your %1$s number above 
•	 Click on the Pay button 
•	 Enter your %1$s PIN when prompted on your phone 
•	 Confirm the details then complete the transaction 
Didn't get the prompt on your phone? Choose paybill and follow the instructions

•	 Go to Equitel menu and select My Money 
•	 Select Eazzy Pay, Pay Bill then select account 
•	 Enter:%1$s as the business number 
•	 Enter %2$s as the account number 
•	 Enter the EXACT amount (%3$s) 
•	 Enter your Equitel M-Banking PIN 
•	 Confirm the details then complete the transaction 
Once you receive a confirmation SMS from Equitel, click on the confirm payment button below

•	 Go to M-PESA on your phone 
•	 Select Lipa na Mpesa option 
•	 Select Pay Bill option 
•	 Enter business no. %1$s 
•	 Enter account no. %2$s 
•	 Enter the EXACT amount %3$s 
•	 Enter your M-PESA PIN and send 
Once you receive a confirmation SMS from M-PESA, click on the confirm payment button below

•	 Dial *222# 
•	 Select Lipa Na Airtel Money 
•	 Select Pay Bill 
•	 Select Other 
•	 Select other 
•	 Enter Paybill Number : %1$s 
•	 Enter EXACT amount (%3$s) 
•	 Enter Account number %2$s 
•	 Confirm transaction details 
•	 Enter your PIN and press OK 
•	 After receiving a confirmation message from Airtel click on the button below

•	 To pay via: %1$s dial %2$s 
•	 Use pesalink, send to mobile number %3$s 
•	 Enter the Enter exact amount %4$s 
•	 If prompted to enter reason/narration enter %5$s 
Once you receive a confirmation SMS from your bank, click on the confirm payment button below
